## About R'tichoke

R'tichoke is a dedicated repository of R programming content, tutorials, and resources. 

Feel free to reach out on [LinkedIn!](https://linkedin.com/in/riddhimanr) 

## How This Site Works

All content on this site is created using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), a next-generation version of R Markdown. Quarto is great for:

1. Writing content in `.qmd` files (Quarto Markdown)
2. Including executable R code chunks
3. Generating beautiful, interactive web pages
4. Creating a consistent, organized structure
